title: Preview: BLOC 2012
body:
Let’s be fucking honest, **BLOC 2012** splits the general public into 3 distinct categories.

1\. People who are going to **BLOC** 2. People who wish they were going to **BLOC**. and 3. People who don’t want to and therefore won’t be reading this article.

So to address the 2 camps; ‘good for you’ and ‘sucks bro, maybe next year?’

The line-up is, as expected, rather freakin super: **Orbital, Flying Lotus, Snoop, Squarepusher, Steve Reich, Amon Tobin, Four Tet, James Blake**…I’m losing the will to type, so [**here’s the complete run-down**](http://www.blocweekend.com/lineup/).

So anyway, to those who are going, have a great time. And to those who aren’t re-read my earlier commiseration above.

Oh and if this article seems half arsed, that’s because it is. But a brother has to get his VIP press passes somehow right?

Seriously though, we couldn’t be more excited for BLOC; check out some of our top tips below.

**Illum Sphere **

**Hype Williams **

**Actress**

**Nicolas Jaar**

**T. Williams **

**Boddika **

**Pariah **

**Redinho**

Grab the last few day tickets [**HERE**.](http://www.blocweekend.com/tickets/) We see you all there this weekend!
